ComicInfo.Locations: Ant Farm,The Hub,Bone Lake,S.H.A.D.E. City,Dead Space
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T20:52:36 [Issue ID 4000-306510] urn:comicvine:4000-306510 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 21:23:06. [Issue ID 901334]
ComicInfo.Summary:
"Monster Planet" comes to its world-shattering conclusion as Frankenstein and Nina take on the massive Sea Monster, while Lady Frankenstein and the rest of the Creature Commandos go head to head with the colossal Ogre Titan. Plus: Don't miss the debut of the G.I. Robot Squadron and the new War Wheel!
Note: The concept Fastball Special in this case is this series' version called a furball special.
ComicInfo.Teams: S.H.A.D.E.,Psychics,Humanids,Titans of Monster Planet,Creature Commandos,G.I. Robot Squadron
ComicInfo.Title: War of the Monsters: Conclusion: Storming the Gates of Hell!
